metadata.title: CVE-2019-8707 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 13, iTunes for Windows 12.10.1,iCloud for Windows 10.7, iCloud for Windows 7.14. Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8707` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.24.4-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.24.4-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.24.4-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
